name: Feet Dolls Salon
description:
*Have you have wonder what is it like working in a pedicure salon? Now you can with this addictive girl game!

- Serve your client's requests! Clean dirty feet, heal wounds, paint foot's nails, decorate nails and more!

- Have different pedicure salons! Start in a simple beauty foot spa and achieve the best one!

- Lot's of fun mini-games to stimulate your memory, time and money managing!

- Play in free mode to do countless nail art and share with your friends!

*For parents*
This free game is perfect for your child, stimulates memory, helps with time managing and how to count money.

If you like this free game please share it on social media. We appreciate a follow, like or comment! Thank you for playing!
